content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I used the "execute_python_code" command to print "Hello, world!" and received a successful response. I then used the "write_to_file" command to create a file named "potential_hiking_trails.txt" with a list of hiking trails near me. I attempted to use the "execute_shell" command to open a website and install an app, but received errors. I then used the "google" command to search for hiking trails near me and used the "browse_website" command to gather information from the AllTrails app about hiking trails in the Czech Republic. Finally, I used the "list_files" command to view the files in the current directory, which includes the file "potential_hiking_trails.txt".
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "read_file", "args": {"filename": "potential_hiking_trails.txt"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command read_file returned: 1. Brno Reservoir Trail\n2. Moravian Karst\n3. Pálava Hills\n4. Jeseníky Mountains\n5. Krkonoše National Park\n6. Šumava National Park', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "Brno Reservoir Trail Moravian Karst P\\u00e1lava Hills Jesen\\u00edky Mountains Krkono\\u0161e National Park \\u0160umava National Park"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["http://www.cski-cr.cz/wp-content/uploads/2020/01/RaOP_proceedings_2015.pdf", "https://www.toulejse.cz/en/tips-for-trips", "https://botzool.sci.muni.cz/verejnost/botanical-excursions-in-moravia.pdf", "https://www.toulejse.cz/en/tips-for-trips/natural-attractions", "https://wikitravel.org/wiki/en/index.php?title=Czech_Republic&mobileaction=toggle_view_desktop", "https://padkos.co/best-places-to-visit-in-the-czech-republic-for-nature-lovers/", "https://www.geonika.cz/mgr/articles/MGR_Volume_07_Issue_2_full.pdf", "https://www.casopis.ochranaprirody.cz/res/archive/080/009487.pdf"]', type='action_result')]
"""
